anyOf.description: The unique ID of this message item.

role.description: The role of the message author. Always `assistant`.

start_index.description: The index of the first character of the citation in the message.

end_index.description: The index of the last character of the citation in the message.

url.description: The URL of the cited resource.

title.description: The title of the cited resource.

annotations.description: Citations associated with the text content.

items.description: A piece of assistant message content, such as text or a refusal.

oneOf.description: The message content, as a single string.

content.description: The message content, as an array of content parts.

anyOf.description: The status of the message item.
